sentences.english: It just dawned on me you lost a son.

to take refuge in religious life

to become a Buddha/to attain enlightenment

to untie/to free/to absolve of/to get free of/to extirpate oneself/(Buddhism) to free oneself of worldly worries

to stand aloof/to be detached from/to transcend worldliness/untrammeled/unconventional
